body:
--------
WARNING: At least one of the links in the message below goes to an .exe file,
which could be malicious. To learn how to protect yourself, please go here:
https://commons.lbl.gov/x/_591B
--------

On 4/9/15, 3:26 PM, "Kolomenski, Andrei (JSC-SF311)[WYLE INTEG. SCI. &
ENG.]" <andrei.kolomenski at nasa.gov> wrote:



Oops, looks like this one isn't making it into the NREL Radiance
installers. Sorry about that! We'll correct this for the next release; in
the meantime here's a download link for the windows version:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/7o87dh1kyah3fyd/bsdfquery.exe?dl=0

- Rob
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Rtrace for Radiance & Irradiance Calc.
subject: [Radiance-general] Rtrace for Radiance & Irradiance Calc.
